column2: United States Steel announced a massive infusion of cash.
column4: U.S. Steel just announced that they are building six new steel mills.

column4: U.S. Steel just announced that they are building six new steel mills.

column2: Canada charges us close to 300% tariffs for dairy products going into Canada, which is essentially saying we don't want your dairy products  this is a wall.
column4: Canada charges the U.S. a 270% tariff on Dairy Products! They didnt tell you that, did they? Not fair to our farmers!

column2: When we make a car, we sell it into China, and there's a 25% tariff.
column4: When a car is sent to the United States from China, there is a Tariff to be paid of 2 12%. When a car is sent to China from the United States, there is a Tariff to be paid of 25%.

column2: The United States is paying close to 90% of the cost of protecting Europe, and I think that's wonderful.
column4: The United States was paying for anywhere from 70 to 90 percent of (NATO), depending on the way you calculate.

column2: And by the way, the wall right now, that wall is coming along.
It's going up and we're getting it built.
I have almost 400 people that haven't been approved by their slowwalking.
column4: Says Democratic obstruction is the reason why "many important positions in government are unfilled."
